com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3.mvp.viewstate.lce

Class AbsLceViewState<D,V extends MvpLceView<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3.mvp.viewstate.lce.AbsLceViewState<D,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - the data / model type
    V - the type of the view
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    LceViewState<D,V>, ViewState<V>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbsParcelableLceViewState, RetainingLceViewState

    public abstract class AbsLceViewState<D,V extends MvpLceView<D>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements LceViewState<D,V>
    A base view state implementation for LceViewState (Loading-Content-Error)
    Since:
    1.0.0
